comment: How did this turn out?  Any changes you would make if you were to do it again?

It was awesome! We've kept some bottles around that we open every now and then, and it's still so good. I guess I'd want to try to actually get the pellicle to form next time. Maybe add the sour blend earlier than 10 days? Hard to say, but it still came out great so it's probably hard to go wrong as long as you age it for long enough.
